summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GTM Newsletter Intelligence App prompt editing feature. All backend API endpoints working perfectly. Frontend Settings page loads correctly with Agent Prompts section, pipeline flow diagram, and collapsible agent cards with prompt editors.

minor_issues.issue: Prompt content sometimes takes a few seconds to load in textarea when agent is first expanded
minor_issues.workaround: Content loads after waiting 2-3 seconds - likely due to API call latency

passed_tests: All agent prompts API endpoints (GET, PUT, DELETE) working perfectly
Individual agent prompt retrieval for all 6 agents
Agent prompt update and verification working
Agent prompt reset to default working
Settings page loads with correct sections
Agent Prompts section visible and accessible
Pipeline Flow diagram shows correct agent sequence
Available variables displayed correctly for agents
Save Prompt button saves custom prompts to database
Reset to Default button resets prompts successfully
Monitored Tools section working with save functionality
